question.title: Will the Cannes Film Festival publish its 2026 official selection before April 10, 2026?
question.description:
This forecasts whether Cannes releases its official selection list before April 10, 2026, which affects film marketing calendars, distribution strategy, and festival planning.

`{"format":"bot_tournament_question","info":{"hash_id":"421294556a662fa9","sheet_id":266.0}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question resolves to yes if, before April 10, 2026, the official Cannes site publishes a press release or official post that announces the Cannes Film Festival 2026 official selection and is dated before April 10, 2026. This question resolves to no if no such official-selection announcement is published on the official Cannes site before April 10, 2026. The primary source is the Cannes press releases feed: https://www.festival-cannes.com/en/press/press-releases/
question.fine_print:
A partial teaser without an official selection list does not count. If Cannes publishes multiple waves, the first publication that clearly constitutes an official selection announcement counts.
 .
question.short_title: Will the Cannes Film Festival publish its 2026 official selection before April 10, 2026?
